question: I am not going well in my studies,i do not decide very quikly and make wrong decisions, my heart does not set in where i want it to, please help me set my heart to studying and my educational future

Your situation is ambiguous and we are unable to offer any specific advice.

In general, if you are doubtful and you are unable to make a decision, you should adopt one or both of the following procedures in deciding on any matter.

Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) said, ?That person who makes Istikhaara (seeks divine guidance) never loses and the person who makes Mashwara (consults) never regrets.? Kindly find attached our article on Istikhaara.

To make Mashwara was also a great Sunnah of Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam). You should identify a responsible person/s in whichever field you are in and make Mashwara. If you arrived at a decision through the above both procedures or any one procedure, place your trust in Allah and proceed. There is no reason for doubt thereafter.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
